Overlord.en: Critical fixes to Adobe's most recent updates. Required to continue transferring shape data between Ai and Ae.

Anubis.en:
Fixes

In preparation for new some future features, we broke the relative render paths and BG rendering in Ae. Sorry about that.

Rubberhose3.en:
Preparing for release

Development is winding down for public release of Rubberhose 3. We are squashing those last bugs and starting to build styles.

  • Path to hose stability
  • CC2021 presets
  • Prevented the last controller pair from being deleted
  • Create missing bones if Add Bones is clicked again
  • Path to Hose s-curves scaled down to 50% direction
  • Improved stability for style presets
  • Fix: adding a bend after an Autoflop
